title: As an investor, what are some things to lookout for when investing in a motion picture? - Quora

response.answer_text: Unless you are directly involved in the film industry I would not advise investing in it. This is a complicated industry. The directors, producers, actors & actresses usually get a % of the film and by the time the profits, if any gets distributed there is not much left for the investor. That is if there is any profit as few films generate much net  profit.
